A clockwork mage is a lethal blend of magic and machinery. Each of these clockworks is imbued with an arcane stone at its core that powers spells through the wand embedded in its chest. **[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 28 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 [Clockwork Mage](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1097) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 50 **Perception** +17; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +17 **Str** +2 **Dex** +6 **Con** +4 **Int** -5 **Wis** +2 **Cha** -5 **Wind-Up** 24 hours, DC 26, standby **Items** _clockwork wand_ --- **AC** 27 **Fort** +17 **Ref** +19 **Will** +17 **HP** 115 **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poisoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Resistances** physical 5 (except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374) or orichalcum) **Weaknesses** electricity 10, [orichalcum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=378) 10 **Clockwork Wand** The clockwork mage uses a mechanical wand as a focus to channel magical energy. This wand is built into the clockwork mage's chest, with only the crystal at the end exposed. The mage can Interact to the remove the wand, or someone else can remove it with a DC 31 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) check to [Disable a Device](/Actions.aspx?ID=69). The clockwork mage becomes unable to cast any spells except cantrips while the wand is removed.
When removed, the _clockwork wand_ is a magic wand containing the last 2nd-level innate spell the clockwork mage cast (the GM determines the spell randomly if it has not cast any eligible spells). The spells are placed within the wand while the mage is created, and the creator can substitute other arcane spells of the appropriate level. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** fist +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 2d10+6 bludgeoning **Arcane Innate Spells** DC 28, attack +20 - **Cantrips (5th)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330) - **1st** [Feather Fall](/Spells.aspx?ID=111), [Floating Disk](/Spells.aspx?ID=124), [Grease](/Spells.aspx?ID=140) - **2nd** [Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [Obscuring Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=210), [Web](/Spells.aspx?ID=374) - **3rd** [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Stinking Cloud](/Spells.aspx?ID=309) - **4th** [Blink](/Spells.aspx?ID=27), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) - **5th** [Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23), [Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47) **Energize Clockwork Wand** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per 10 minutes; **Effect** The clockwork mage regains a spell it has already cast that day. It must spend 1 hour of its operational time, or 2 hours if the spell is 3rd level or higher.
name: Clockwork Mage
